summary: Every holiday Marcel and his family go to their cottage in the Provence (France). He likes the hills in this region. Before they arrive at the cottage they have to walk about 5 miles. With ... See full summary »
cast: Philippe Caubère|Nathalie Roussel|Didier Pain|Thérèse Liotard|Julien Ciamaca|Victorien Delamare|Joris Molinas|Julie Timmerman|Paul Crauchet|Philippe Uchan|Patrick Préjean|Pierre Maguelon|Michel Modo|Jean Carmet|Jean Rochefort|Georges Wilson|Jean-Pierre Darras|Josy Andrieu|André Chaumeau|Raoul Curet|Alain Ganas|Ticky Holgado|Jean-Marie Juan|Louis Lalanne|Maxime Lombard|René Loyon|Elisabeth Macocco|Jean Maurel|Ivan Romeuf
title: El castillo de mi madre
